all_questions.context: However, this authority would still be limited to a period of 60 days, after which the presence of troops outside the Czech Republic would have to be approved by Parliament, just as it is now.

all_questions.question: Why can the government send troops outside Czech territory for a maximum of 60 days without prior parliamentary approval?
all_questions.context: The current proposal thus expands the range of defined cases in which the government can send troops outside Czech territory for a maximum of 60 days without prior parliamentary approval.
